ui.error.authentication: Ye can't come aboard, ye scallywag! Either the seas be down, or yer charter is kaput!
ui.error.ccu: Too many lubbers in this sea... (100 pirates). Set course fer another region.
ui.error.connection: We've run aground! Chart th' map properly, then try oncemore.
ui.error.kicked: Ye been thrown overboard. A pity...
ui.error.banned: Dead men tell no tales! Ye've been keelhauled!
ui.error.timeout: We're off course! Make sure th' map is charted properly, then try once more.
ui.error.plugin: Ye were keelhauled by th' sea itself. Th' crime: {reason}
ui.error.join.full: We've too much weight! All hands are at deck.
ui.error.join.notfound: Looks like there were no treasure here at all, me hearty!
ui.error.join.alreadyingame: Ye've already boarded this vessel in another visage o th' sea.
ui.error.join.banned: Yer forbidden passage on this vessel, ya cur!
ui.error.unknown: The charter's run us off course! ({errorcode})
ui.title.button: Press any button to Set Sail!
ui.update.header: Ahoy! Thar be a new version!
ui.update.download: Set course fer the download page!
ui.extras.replays.defaultname.invalidmap: A crew o' {playercount} on uncharted waters
ui.extras.replays.temporary: Fleetin' - Will meet th' devil in {expire} voyage(s)!
ui.extras.replays.temporary.next: Fleetin' - Will meet th' devil next voyage!
ui.extras.replays.delete.text:
Do ye wish t' forget '{replayname}'? 
This decision be irreversible.
ui.extras.replays.incompatible: Ahoy there! This tale only be told in {version}!
ui.extras.replays.none:
Yer head be empty ye scurvy dog!

Tale tellin' be allowed, head to the seas me heartie!
ui.extras.replays.disabled:
Yer head be empty ye scurvy dog!

Tale tellin' be forbidden.. Allow it to amass yer tales of woe says I!
ui.extras.replays.search.hidden: {replays} additional tale(s) arr hidden by yer seekin' terms.. change it if yer miserable!
Selected booty {file} was not a tale.
Selected booty {file} couldn't be brought aboard. Perhaps th' real treasure was the.. nay. Check yer version and try once more!
ui.options.general.filter: Keep the bilge rats at bay!
ui.options.general.usenicknamecolor: Adorn yer swag n' riches (if ye got th' plunder)
ui.options.general.refreshnicknamecolor: Attach a Discord persona t' unearth swag
ui.options.graphics.ndspixelperfect: See as the sailors o' th' Golden Age (4:3 only)
ui.options.audio.mutemusic: Silence sea shanties when ye be lookin' away
ui.options.audio.mutesfx: Silence cannon blasts when ye be lookin' away
ui.options.audio.directionalaudio: Listen fer danger from all directions!
ui.options.audio.restartmusicondeath: Play the booty again ye dead lubber!
ui.options.audio.specialpowerupmusic: Scuttlebutt fer power, it lings the hearties!
ui.options.audio.specialpowerupmusic.bot: Both th' starfish an fer th' Kraken
ui.options.controls.player.propellerjump: Harness th' Suit o' Gale's rudders when jumpin' mid-air
ui.options.controls.rebind.body:
Press any {device} button / key
If ye change yer mind about rebindin', wait for countdown before returnin' to seas!
ui.rooms.username.label: Yer pirate name
ui.rooms.hidden: {rooms} additional ship(s) are barred on manifest
ui.rooms.listing.name: {playername}'s Crew
ui.rooms.create.webgl:
Sailing this ship while using the tattered web version o' this game is warned of by smart sailors, as the fog be discombobulatin' and cruel compared to th' clear skies and softer seas a regular version shall entail. 

Use th' standalone version when manning yer own ship, says I!
ui.inroom.settings.game.map.description: The isle th' battle be anchored at. Be careful to consider th' destination when ye change th' pirates code, lest ye be scuttled or worse by yer own misjudgement. (fer example, th' Hourglass is a pirate's smart choice when sailing the waters of Citadel Key)
ui.inroom.settings.game.stars.descriptio: Th' main voyage from the golden age! Pirates take their glory from plundering the specified number o' mighty stars.
ui.inroom.settings.game.coins.descriptio: Collecting this many pieces of eight will spawn a random armament. Th' power that spawns be based on how poorly a pirate be doing, how far on course th' richest corsair be, as well as pirate code's limits for certain isles (for example, ye cannot become th' Kraken on Citadel Key)
ui.inroom.settings.game.lives.descriptio: Specifies th' number o' souls all pirates hold. When a pirate is cast to th' devil, they become a ghastly spectre. Pirates that lost their souls will drop any plunder they were stowing on their persons.
ui.inroom.settings.game.timer.descriptio: Sets the sands to limit th' battle, in minutes. When the timer be over, the pirate (or crew) with th' most plunder be the winners o' the scuffle. If there be a tie for the victor, th' battle will steadfast until th' curse is broken.
ui.inroom.settings.game.teams.descriptio: Allows pirates to choose between one of five different crews to fly the colors of. Pirates on the same crew all work to share th' plunder by the rule of thumb. Attackin' yer hearties will not remove their stars, lest it be a mutiny yer after...
ui.inroom.settings.game.friendlyfire.des: Allows pirates on the same crew to fire on their own men. This trechery includes direct scuffles (such as stomps or th' Suit o' Gale's strike from the heavens), along with ammunition from armaments such as th' Inferno Ivy.
ui.inroom.settings.game.powerups.descrip: Allows th' spawn of powers unknown to th' golden age, such as th' Frost Ivy and th' Suit o' Gale.
ui.inroom.settings.room.bans.none: Not a soul be cast off deck.
ui.inroom.chat.muted: A throw to the coppers shant lubber ye...
ui.inroom.chat.player.promote: {playername} be the new captain of this ship!
ui.inroom.chat.player.kicked: {playername} was cast off th' plank by the Cap'n
ui.inroom.chat.player.promoted: {playername} be promoted to the rank of captain!
ui.inroom.chat.player.unbanned: {playername} was brung aboard by th' Cap'n
ui.inroom.chat.command: Arrr, ye be not seein' any o' them chat commands anymore, me hearty! Instead, be clickin' on a scallywag's username to keep order on yer ship, says I!
ui.inroom.chat.server.starting: All hands hoy! Game be beginnin' in {countdown} ticks...
ui.inroom.chat.server.startcancelled: All hands stop! The game start be cancelled!
ui.inroom.chat.server.ended.team: Th' battle be won by the crew o' {team}!
ui.inroom.chat.server.ended.draw: The smoke clears with all sailors scuttled...
ui.inroom.chat.server.ended.hostdc: Th' battle be over due to captain overboard! Mid-battle captain migration shall be added in the future.
gamemode.starchasers.description: Th' original voyage had since the golden age! Plunder the elusive Mighty Stars to secure yer victory, snatch pieces of eight to spawn forth powers, and scuttle other pirates t' swipe their vault o' Mighty Stars!
gamemode.coinrunners.description: Clash against pirates in combat t' spill their doubloons; be th' soul with the most riches by th' end o' the hourglass t' be the victor! Massive Coins be worth 25 doubloons, and dying will cause ye to lose 20 percent of yer booty. If ye be far behind on voyage, snatching enough pieces of eight can spawn a golden pirates hat which will grant a pirate tons of doubloons!
